name: Sweet Dreams (Miguel Giménez)
description:
Fixed 600x600 version

Sugar is a fearful girl who defeats her fears while sleeping in order to rescue his friends:

Honey, the bear.

Candy, the doll.

And Cake, the cat.

As you can see, Sugar loves sweet things. Help her to get the candies and beat her enemies by throwing tennis balls

Trailer:

Music by Eric Skiff, available on http://glitchnyc.com/music
